name: Pink Piano Tap - white music Tile
name_original: Pink Piano Tap - white music Tile
description:
Piano Tile for pink is the best pink piano Tile game experience you can get on the complete store. These Pink Piano Tile will give you the best touch which will be smooth to play It is also exciting as you will be required to play Piano Tile in limited time of 10 seconds, sounds interesting?

in Pink Piano Tile is available different four level like arcade classic time and alert

this all addictive level is very quickly play with different feature.


Pink Piano for Challenge: Features & Highlights

Intelligent pink Piano Tile Placement Incepting New Color for piano to provide best User Experience with different Color Time perfection of moving pink tiles Improvised for real touch feel in piano and Responsive Design  #4 Levels:

Classic: For competing towards achiving the completion in shortest time, you can learn and be friendly with the pink Piano Tile in this level, a warm up atmosphere for new players

Arcade: Black are symbol of bad, get them all! Take and tap over every black tile rigorously you see to kill it and that will give you beautiful sounds. An arcade with the feel of pressure freeing sense, that's best about unique pink Piano Tile

Time: Time stipulated environment always tests your senses at best and this Piano Tile pink game exactly does the same. You will get the maximum time of 10 seconds to play in this level of game and that is truly leveling up I guess. Tap over as many number of pink piano
tiles as you can to achieve competitive scores and play relentlessly to compete your own scores.

Alert: this level are included different color in screen in alert type don’t touch white and red tiles only touch Pink tiles if you tap red than start to beggining the level or play other levels
